page.title: 03GAMES THAT CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: The games that we play in the yard are "British Bulldogs","Kick the Can", "Monster Man","Tip","Penny 123", "Space Invaders","Three Chances", "Stuck in the Mud","Hopscotch" and "White Horses". "Ball Tip" is a popular game in my school but "British Bulldogs" is the best game. One person is chosen to be "on". He stands on a spot and all the other children that play the game stand around. The one chosen chooses a{name}and then that person must reach the chosen spot without being caught. If he's not caught all the other children who play must get to the "base" before "Bulldog" returns. If the person whose name was called is caught then both must go to "base" and call out another name until the whole lot are caught and become "Bulldogs" and the game ends.
